document_data.name: ''Stormscale''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Stormscale''''' was a unique set of [[enchanted]] [[chainmail]] designed in honor of the [[sahuagin]] [[Umberlant]]s sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Stormscale'' was a set of chains made of a dark metal. It granted the wearer limited immunity to lightning and electricity and discharged a damaging spark of electricity on anyone landing a successful strike on the wearer, similar to the ''[[electric jolt]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.History: The first wearer of ''Stormscale'' was the infamous Dread Pirate Admiral [[Bluenose]] who served [[Umberlee]], the Bitch Queen. Admiral Bluenose parted with ''Stormscale'' sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1372}} when it was stored amongst Governor [[Blackeyes]]' buried treasures near [[Spindrift Town]] on the [[Nelanther Isles]] off the [[Sword Coast]].
